oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Brochure for Shelbyville performance
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Beautiful Jim Key was an intelligent horse who performed for nine years around the country to large crowds at expositions, world's fairs, schools, and other venues. He demonstrated his ability to read, write, spell, and in this photograph, sort mail. He
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Animals in human situations -- 1890-1900; Animals in human situations -- 1900-1910
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A program for a performance by Beautiful Jim Key entitled, "Beautiful Jim Key In his Remarkable Two Act Play The Scholar and a Model Office Boy." The performance was held at the Opera House in Shelbyville.
